A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The beginning is horrible. The attempts at humor are just sad...no one ever really laughed. The movie couldn't decide if it was going to be a charming action movie or dark story. The premise is also weak as is the script. Sadly Rian Johnson did not do a good job on this one.The acting is pretty awful too until about midway when the action starts. Although the movie begins to be entertaining at a certain point\, it is still just a weak storyline...so much cheesiness. I liked it better than the episode 4 ripoff of the \"The Force Awakens\,\" but not by much. Even the prequel ones (90s and early 00s) are better than this one. And the originals along with Rogue 1 are still the best.  I don't know why critics are loving this one so much...or why the even loved the \"Force Awakens.\"
